name: xustosapi
description: A sample Node.js app using Express 4

scripts.build: npm install;npm run lint;npm run tsc
scripts.prepackage: npm run build && npm prune --production && tar cvf - node_modules | tar xvf - -C dist/js && npm install
scripts.package:dev: npm run prepackage;aws --profile xustosdev cloudformation package --template-file cfn/master.yaml --output-template-file dist/master-output.yaml --s3-bucket com-xustos-xustosapi-dev;rm -rf dist/js/node_modules
scripts.package:prod: npm run prepackage;aws --profile xustosprod cloudformation package --template-file cfn/master.yaml --output-template-file dist/master-output.yaml --s3-bucket com-xustos-xustosapi-prod;rm -rf dist/js/node_modules
scripts.deploy:dev: aws --profile xustosdev cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/master-output.yaml --stack-name xustosapidev --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides Environment=dev IdPoolStack=xustos-idpool-dev
scripts.deploy:prod: aws --profile xustosprod cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/master-output.yaml --stack-name xustosapiprod --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides Environment=prod

author: Francois Gauthier
